snippet: As final touches are applied to carmakers' displays ahead of the opening of the 2012 Detroit auto show, rising sales give the auto industry a good reason to celebrate in Motor City. But uncertainty remains.
abstract: As final touches are applied to carmakers' displays ahead of the opening of the 2012 Detroit auto show, rising sales give the auto industry a good reason to celebrate in Motor City. But uncertainty remains.
lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Automobiles section, Jerry Garrett looks ahead to the 2012 Detroit auto show, where press previews begin Sunday evening and continue through Tuesday.
